segments.text: I need to talk to you about something .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What did you need to talk about ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have some questions about my lease .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Exactly how long is my lease for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your lease will be up in three years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What will happen if I move out before then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you move out before then , you will not get your deductible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Because our contract says that you will live here for three years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , I think that I understand .
segments.speaker: S1
